Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
dialogs_chapter_6_Риом Рури. Полагаю, ты: Ryom Ruri. I guess you know who I am.
dialogs_chapter_6_Да. Влур-Стиг, создате:
Yes. Vlur-Stig, creator of the Ravagers and\..\..\.. fellow
Werolomger Ireus. You are the Hierarch.
dialogs_chapter_6_Хоть кто-то помнит обо: At least someone remembers me. Glad to hear that.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рита, командир мед-кор: Rita, commander of the medical corps.
dialogs_chapter_6_И ты, ходячая погибель: And you, the walking death of all my subordinates.
dialogs_chapter_6_Слушай, если бы твои з:
Listen, if your animals had not united with ours
enemy\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_6_Не оправдывайся. Факт:
Don't make excuses. A fact is a fact and there's nothing wrong 
with that you can do it.
dialogs_chapter_6_Проходите. Перед тем,:
Come in. Before we resolve all differences, I can
answer a couple of questions. If you want to.
dialogs_chapter_6_Почему ты объединился: Why did you team up with the Risens?
dialogs_chapter_6_Когда-то давно я укрыл:
Once upon a time I took refuge in a jagged canyon with one
a simple goal - to create an army worthy of defending
Fortress of Paradise - City of Hierarchs.
dialogs_chapter_6_За тем, как исполнение:
After the execution of the will went into full swing,
In the territory of the canyon, I noticed the first detachment of 
reapers. I hid all the Ilgants out of harm's way.
dialogs_chapter_6_Так раньше звались те,:
That’s what those you called “devastators” used to be called.
Ilgants, servants of the gates of Paradise.
dialogs_chapter_6_Но даже так, вы все ра: But even so, you still managed to find them.
dialogs_chapter_6_И убить. Ильганты нико:
And kill. The Ilgants never attacked first, not
showed any aggression.
dialogs_chapter_6_Жнецы без каких-либо с:
The Reapers slaughtered everyone without any doubt. Why?
I personally came to ask this question.
dialogs_chapter_6_Меня тоже приняли за б:
I was also mistaken for a wandering evil spirit and also tried
kill\..\..\.. If only they knew who they raised their hand to, maybe
survived.
dialogs_chapter_6_С того дня, я понял, ч:
From that day, I realized what you were and decided
test your creations on your warriors, improving them
one after another.
dialogs_chapter_6_Нынешнее ильганты всег:
The current ilgants are just the beginning, they have not yet
trained to control magical energy and only a few
They can attack with lightning, fire, or something stronger.
dialogs_chapter_6_Восставшие хотят уничт:
Risens want to destroy Purgatory according to the will of their
Lords Adamant, I want to push you out of the territory
Canyon once and for all.
dialogs_chapter_6_У нас с Адамантом есть:
Adamant and I have our own personal scores to settle with you.
How can you not take advantage of such a good opportunity?
dialogs_chapter_6_Марс… Сан… Финлер… Ара:
Mars\..\..\.. San\..\..\.. Finler\..\..\.. Aran\..\..\.. Atlanta\..\..\. .1000
Rivalserov. How many more lives do you need  t-to
quench your thirst for revenge? Extinguish the hatred towards us.
dialogs_chapter_6_Скажите, господин Влур:
Tell me, Mr. Vlur-Stig, is this worthy of a servant
Creator of Everything\..\..\.. stoop to human barbarism?
dialogs_chapter_6_Вам место среди бродяч:
Your place is among the wandering Guardians, outcasts without 
a master.
dialogs_chapter_6_Будь у вас пах между н:
If you had your groin between your legs, I would have punched 
you with all my might.
dialogs_chapter_6_Не суди других, и кишк: Don't judge others, and your guts won't stain the area.
dialogs_chapter_6_Кто такие опустошители:
Who are the Ravagers? Why does Paradise need an army of 
hybrids humans and demons?
dialogs_chapter_6_Ильганты, или опустоши:
Ilgants, or devastators, are a mixture of all warlike
qualities scattered between humans and demons.
dialogs_chapter_6_Обе расы неплохо умеют: Both races are good at exterminating their own kind.
dialogs_chapter_6_Я похитил по одному пр:
I kidnapped one representative from each side,
and then with his own hands he created a creature that
ferocity is not inferior to demons. And insidious like people.
dialogs_chapter_6_И как ты собирался их: And how were you going to control them?
dialogs_chapter_6_Убрал лишнее, то что п:
I removed the unnecessary things that lead them to meaningless
conflicts out of the blue.
dialogs_chapter_6_Так ильганты стали пос:
So the Ilgants became obedient, easy to
control, but their anger still burns.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты не создал новую рас:
You didn't create a new race. You just made obedient
demons who will fight with their real ones
relatives.
dialogs_chapter_6_Не только сородичами,: Not only relatives, with everyone who threatens Paradise.
dialogs_chapter_6_Какова твоя цель? Чего: What is your goal? What do you want to achieve?
dialogs_chapter_6_Доделать дело, которое:
To finish the work that the Creator himself entrusted to me, the 
lord Raya.
dialogs_chapter_6_Создать армию для защи: Create an army to protect the city of Hierarchs.
dialogs_chapter_6_Я не смог этого сделат: I could not do this, because the First Cataclysm occurred.
dialogs_chapter_6_12 Судей, самые сильны:
The 12 Judges, the most powerful monsters of the Abyss, broke 
out were freed and walked through the world of the Dead, killing 
everyone on the way.
dialogs_chapter_6_К счастью, их поход за:
Fortunately, their campaign ended just as quickly and suddenly,
just like it started. They scattered all over the world.
dialogs_chapter_6_А после, я узнал, что:
And then I found out that this group of creatures turns out to be
Absolute Evil killed God. But even so, my goal is not
changed and I returned to work on improving Ilgants.
dialogs_chapter_6_Недалеко я продвинулся:
I didn't get far. The next problem was
you reapers.
dialogs_chapter_6_А если бы и Рай с конц: What if Paradise had finally fallen? What would you do then?
dialogs_chapter_6_Укрылся в Забытом Горо:
Tucked away in the Forgotten City, the perfect place to go
One creature of the world of the Dead does not dare to go.
Except for the Hierarchs.
dialogs_chapter_6_Значит пока ты получае:
So as long as you receive orders from your Higher Powers,
there is a meaning to life for you.
dialogs_chapter_6_Верно. И ради того, чт:
That's right. And in order to be useful to your masters
I will sacrifice everything.
dialogs_chapter_6_И так, вы знаете причи:
And so, you know the reasons for my actions. The time has 
come court.
dialogs_chapter_6_Стой! Мы можем решить:
Stop! We can solve everything peacefully. Tell me what you want
Want? I'll hand it over to Purgatory and the High Reapers of you
listen, you will agree\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_6_Поздно. Твои владыки н:
It's too late. Your masters will not dare to kill the one who is guilty.
Even I'm not sure of my strength against him.
dialogs_chapter_6_Тогда мы… я могу распр: Then we\..\..\.. I can deal with the one who angered you.
dialogs_chapter_6_Тогда чего ты добивалс: Then what did you achieve by inviting us to an audience?
dialogs_chapter_6_Кенчиру, ты ошибся в д: Kenchiru, you got two things wrong.
dialogs_chapter_6_Во первых, я приглашал: Firstly, I did not invite “you”, but him.
dialogs_chapter_6_Влур-Стиг показал паль: Vlur-Stig pointed his finger at Riom.
dialogs_chapter_6_Во вторых, Гарт вас об: Secondly, Garth deceived you. This is not an audience.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты об этом пожалеешь…:
You'll regret this\..\..\.. The rebels distract from more serious 
threat\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_6_Бездна нестабильна… Он:
The Abyss is unstable\..\..\.. It is overflowing with the souls of the 
fallen reapers, demons and angels\..\..\.. And when it cracks,
the gates will open\..\..\.. The second Cataclysm will be for our
peace last.
dialogs_chapter_6_И ты, Риом, поможешь и:
And you, Riom, will help them destroy everyone\..\..\.. If you kill
me.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты говоришь о прокляты: Are you talking about the damned?
dialogs_chapter_6_(Коельтан. Как лучше п: (Koeltan. What is the best thing to do?)
dialogs_chapter_6_То что он говорит прав:
What he says is true. But he exaggerates his role.
If you leave him alive, he might plant his scythe in your face.
back. Or do as you say. It's better
The traitors will decide what to do with him.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рита, Кен, свяжитесь с:
Rita, Ken, contact Purgatory and ask Faith-lovers, what should 
we do with Vlur.
dialogs_chapter_6_Метким ударом рапиры Р:
With a well-aimed blow from his rapier, Rickard pierced 
Vlur-Stig's skull.
dialogs_chapter_6_Наконец-то. 150 лет ох:
Finally. 150 years of hunting. You made us follow you
run around, Vlur-Stig.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рикард достал голограф:
Rickard took out a holographic tablet and something
crossed out.
dialogs_chapter_6_Молодец, Риом. Не зря:
Well done, Riom. It’s not for nothing that I entrusted you with the 
Morkret Genome.
dialogs_chapter_6_Какого черт… Зачем ты: What the hell... Why did you kill him?
dialogs_chapter_6_За несколько сотен пав:
For several hundred fallen Rivalsers, almost 2 thousand
battle reapers and the nearly killed Treacher.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты и сам видел сколько:
You yourself have seen how much work his creations have 
done.
dialogs_chapter_6_Без своего создателя о:
Without their creator, the devastators will go wild and kill
each other.
dialogs_chapter_6_И больше не будут союз: And they will no longer be allies for the Risen.
dialogs_chapter_6_Сегодня вы, одной друж:
Today you, as one friendly team, decided half
problems of Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_6_Перед смертью… Влур го:
Before his death\..\..\.. Vlur said that the Risen are just
a distraction and that the Abyss is unstable.
The Second Cataclysm is coming.
dialogs_chapter_6_Жнецы от малого до выс:
Reapers from low to high rank are preparing to meet creatures 
from the Abyss.
dialogs_chapter_6_Это суть всего нашего: This is the essence of our entire existence.
dialogs_chapter_6_И пока мы не решим до:
And until we completely solve the problem with the Risen,
preparations for the Second Cataclysm will have to be 
postponed.
dialogs_chapter_6_Не забивайте себе этим: Don't bother yourself with this. Follow me.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рикард прошёл пару шаг: Rickard walked a couple of steps forward.
dialogs_chapter_6_После смерти Влур-Стиг: After the death of Vlur-Stig, the surrounding space dissipated.
dialogs_chapter_6_Вы добрались так далек: You've made it this far\..\..\.. It's good that you're alive.
And I'm glad to see you.
dialogs_chapter_6_Как видишь. А ты, Риом: As you see. Are you, Riom, still afraid of dungeons?
dialogs_chapter_6_Ненавижу сильнее обычн: I hate it more than usual.
dialogs_chapter_6_Буду рад послушать о в: I'll be glad to hear about your adventures, but now\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_6_Пора отчаливать в Южны: It's time to set sail for the South Canyon.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ещё успеете любезностя: You still have time to exchange pleasantries.
dialogs_chapter_6_Жнецы. Командир Рикард: Reapers. Commander Rickard, the teleporter is ready.
dialogs_chapter_6_Владыка, простите. Я н:
Lord, forgive me. I did not dare to fight the Werolomger
Laurita.
dialogs_chapter_6_Мною овладел страх… Пр: I was overcome by fear\..\..\.. Forgive me.
dialogs_chapter_6_Все хорошо, Гарт. Ты с: It's okay, Garth. You did your job. You can go.
dialogs_chapter_6_И так, вы двое, отныне: And so, you two are my guests from now on.
dialogs_chapter_6_Я планировал немного п: I planned to talk to Riom for a bit, and then execute him.
dialogs_chapter_6_Но нас двоих ты не оси: But you can't handle the two of us.
dialogs_chapter_6_Риома я не боюсь, а во: I'm not afraid of Ryoma, but you, Laurita\..\..\.. Yes, I am.
dialogs_chapter_6_Не стоит. Я пришла с м: Not worth it. I come in peace.
dialogs_chapter_6_Опустошители жили на т:
The Ravagers lived in the Jagged Canyon
long before the reapers sent the first one here
expedition.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ошибка одного командир:
One commander's mistake turned strangers,
potential allies, into sworn enemies.
dialogs_chapter_6_Мы можем жить в мире,: We can live in peace, being next door to each other.
dialogs_chapter_6_Только скажи, Влур, чт: Just tell me, Vlur, what do you want?
dialogs_chapter_6_У этой резни будет оди:
This massacre will have one outcome - complete extermination
devastators with you.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты сможешь донести до:
Can you convey my conditions to Purgatory?
I understand that you will not escape from your outposts.
Okay, stay.
dialogs_chapter_6_Но с моим творениями л: But it’s better not to interfere with my creations.
dialogs_chapter_6_Конечно и даже убедить: Of course, and even convince others to do it your way.
dialogs_chapter_6_Конкретику уже с Иреем: You can discuss the specifics with Irey.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рад слышать. Чего же я:
Glad to hear. What do I want? Justice. Punishment
those whom even Death itself cannot punish.
dialogs_chapter_6_Этот жнец первым проли:
This reaper was the first to shed our blood, and on him we will 
stake bloody point.
dialogs_chapter_6_Чего-чего!? Ты хочешь,:
What-what!? You want us to get into blacklist of the punitive 
corps?!
dialogs_chapter_6_Не знаю насколько он с:
I don't know how strong he is, but everyone I talked to
they said to beware of him. Not only to fight with him, but
It's dangerous to say hello.
dialogs_chapter_6_Интересно. В этот спис: Interesting. Are criminals on this list?
dialogs_chapter_6_Хах. У меня есть кое-ч: Hah. I have something that one of my charges saw.
dialogs_chapter_6_Влур-Стиг достал одно: Vlur-Stig took out one of the Hierarchs' devices, a memory ball.
dialogs_chapter_6_Командир Рикард, вы сл:
Commander Rickard, you got too carried away. Maybe you 
shouldn't kill all creatures? This is at odds with what we the lady 
ordered.
dialogs_chapter_6_Вы сами составите отчё:
Will you draw up a report yourself? A detachment will arrive here 
soon intelligence officers and it will be awkward for them about 
this\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_6_Правой рукой Рикард пе:
Rikard covered the girl's face with his right hand. With his left
grabbed his right hand, forming a “ring.”
dialogs_chapter_6_Подобно тому, как удав:
Just as a boa constrictor breaks the victim's bones, Rickard 
began squeeze the reaper's skull.
dialogs_chapter_6_Девушка билась в истер: The girl was hysterical, trying to break free.
dialogs_chapter_6_Её череп хрустнул и ра: Her skull crunched and shattered into small pieces.
dialogs_chapter_6_Хорошо, что обнаружили:
It’s good that we found these creatures, the traces began to be 
removed much easier.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рик тайком убивает сво: Rick secretly kills his\..\..\.. during attacks?
dialogs_chapter_6_Вот же гад… Теперь всё:
What a bastard\..\..\.. Now everything fits together. This girl. 
One of scouts, was killed by the devastators.
According to the punitive version.
dialogs_chapter_6_И подобных объяснений:
And we have a ton of similar explanations. Many reapers have
disappeared missing, but they were considered killed in action.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты знаешь где сейчас Р: Do you know where Rickard is now? Is he in the canyon?
dialogs_chapter_6_На подходе к моей лабо: On the way to my laboratory. Literally a couple of meters away.
dialogs_chapter_6_Этот шар. Подобных зап: This ball. Are there many more posts like this?
dialogs_chapter_6_Не мало. У вас неделя: Not a little. It will take you a week to look through all this.
dialogs_chapter_6_Хорошо. Тогда договор,:
Okay. Then the deal is, you call off all your animals,
you will cut off all contacts with the Risen and lead
dialogue with the headquarters of the Treacherers.
dialogs_chapter_6_А мы с Риомом покараем:
And Riom and I will punish Rikard. Either we kill or we will force 
you to go into exile. Without the support of Purgatory he will 
weaken and we can finish him off if you want.
dialogs_chapter_6_Согласен. Либо принеси:
I agree. Either bring him his head, or deprive him of everything
makes him a reaper. Let him turn into a stray dog, on
which everyone should sing.
dialogs_chapter_6_А нас с тобой забыть с:
And they asked you and me to forget. What do you think, is 
there a desire to help\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_6_(Мне это тоже не нрави:
(I don't like it either. Fighting Rick is suicide.
But I don’t want to argue with Laurita either. So give me more
strength, for the sake of the common good.)
dialogs_chapter_6_Не бойся, мы справимся: Don't be afraid, we can handle it. Believe me.
dialogs_chapter_6_Да, только не жди от м:
Yes, just don't expect miracles from me. I haven't reached the same level
same as you and Rickard.
dialogs_chapter_6_Помни всему, что научи: Remember everything you have learned and don’t get into trouble.
dialogs_chapter_6_О! Риом, Лаурита, не о:
Oh! Riom, Laurita, I didn’t expect to see you here.
Who teleported you?
dialogs_chapter_6_Неважно. Рикард, у нас: Doesn't matter. Rickard, we have a couple of questions for you.
dialogs_chapter_6_Уже не “командир Рикар:
No longer “Commander Rickard”. Interesting\..\..\.. Well, come 
on, Ask.
dialogs_chapter_6_Зачем ты первым напал: Why did you attack the Ravagers first?
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты чем-то болен, или о: Are you sick or obsessed with something?
dialogs_chapter_6_Какие секреты ты пряче: What secrets are you hiding from Purgatory?
dialogs_chapter_6_Зачем ты первым напал:
Why did you attack the Ravagers first? This was
some need?
dialogs_chapter_6_Были в гостях Влур-Сти:
We were visiting Vlur-Stig. He told you a lot of stories
hanged?
dialogs_chapter_6_Опустошители это гибри:
Ravagers are a hybrid of a demon and a human. The two most
aggressive, dangerous and uncontrollable creatures.
dialogs_chapter_6_За время первой экспед:
During the first expedition, my corps cut out almost
all creatures on the surface of the canyon, thereby paving
way for engineers and creators.
dialogs_chapter_6_Мои действия никак не: My actions did not contradict the will of Death in any way.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты создал врага, котор:
You created an enemy, which you yourself are now trampling on.
And by It's your fault the devastators see us as a threat and kill 
us everyone.
dialogs_chapter_6_Из-за тебя у меня не б:
Because of you, I had no choice but to force get through to 
Vlur-Stig and bring him to his senses.
dialogs_chapter_6_По твоей вине… Несколь:
It's your fault\..\..\.. Several thousand of my brothers are lying
torn to pieces all over the area and waiting for them
The garbage men will collect it.
dialogs_chapter_6_Как думаешь, что сдела:
What do you think the mistress will do to you when she finds 
out the truth?
Vlur told me this too. Let's be more specific.
dialogs_chapter_6_Мы с Ларитой видели, к: Larita and I saw you\..\..\.. kill the reapers.
dialogs_chapter_6_Я знала, что у тебя бе:
I knew that you had problems with your head, but so
Badly\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_6_Лаурита, ты прекрасно:
Laurita, you know very well what you have to pay,
to reach the limit of your capabilities.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рассудком. Не прикрыва:
With reason. Don't cover up the problem with your magic
rapier. Achieving the form of release has nothing to do with you
didn't affect me like it did.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты явно что-то ещё с с: You've clearly done something else to yourself.
dialogs_chapter_6_Раз этот диалог послед:
Since this dialogue is the last\..\..\.. What do you know about the 
devils?
dialogs_chapter_6_Ещё как может. Рапира:
As well as it can. The Sheren-Tizer rapier is not my only
weapon. Besides her, I mixed my blood with demonic and
received the talents of the inhabitants of Hell.
dialogs_chapter_6_И что тебе даст демони:
And what will the demonic face give you? You'll tear your face 
apart, you will receive a surge of strength and for this you gave 
Satan your intelligence?
dialogs_chapter_6_Рикард достает колбу с: Rickard takes out a flask with red liquid.
dialogs_chapter_6_Человеческая кровь. Зн:
Human blood. Do you know why this is a delicacy among
demons?
dialogs_chapter_6_Безумец… Демоны те ещё:
Madman\..\..\.. Demons are also cannibals. Blood and human 
meat they give them a significant boost in strength.
dialogs_chapter_6_Именно. А теперь счита:
Exactly. Now count. Release form, face
demon, human blood and all at the same time.
dialogs_chapter_6_Едва ли в окрестностях:
There is hardly anyone in the vicinity who can
overcome.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ингода я словно засыпа:
Ingoda I seem to fall asleep when I see a weak, lonely,
helpless girl. She turns her back. Everything around is getting 
dark.
dialogs_chapter_6_Или паренек, который л:
Or the boy lying under the rocks.
He asks for help. There's no one around either. Except me.
I'll help him.
dialogs_chapter_6_За тем тишина. Я просы:
Behind that there is silence. I wake up, open my eyes and 
everywhere blood. You can't leave the bodies.
dialogs_chapter_6_Да, у меня бывают стра:
Yes, I have strange dreams. But in general, they are not
interfere with the performance of duties.
dialogs_chapter_6_Тихо шифером шурша, ед: The slate rustles quietly, the roof moves slowly\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_6_Что ещё ты скрываешь о: What else are you hiding from everyone?
dialogs_chapter_6_У Влура есть доказател:
Vlur has proof of all your lies. Maybe
Would you like to share something that will tip the scales?
dialogs_chapter_6_Да. Имя Тайжи-ди-Рон т:
Yes. Does the name Taiji-di-Ron mean anything to you?
Or just Taiji.
No idea who you're talking about.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рикард! Заткнись, пока: Rickard! Shut up before you turn into a pile of broken pieces.
dialogs_chapter_6_Стой-стой. Пусть продо:
Wait, wait. Let him continue. One of my past
users, sniffed out something based on this name.
dialogs_chapter_6_(шёпотом) Тебе лучше э: (whispers) It's better for you not to know this.
dialogs_chapter_6_Тайджи, основатель орд: Taiji, founder of the order of devils and my mentor.
dialogs_chapter_6_И главная ошибка Чисти: And the main mistake of Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_6_Он был талантливым жне:
He was a talented reaper, he managed to quickly master
artifact weapon and master the release form.
In just a couple of months.
dialogs_chapter_6_А после он, случайно,:
And then he accidentally destroyed the annex of Purgatory, in
several hundred kilometers.
dialogs_chapter_6_Один взмах высвобожден:
One swing of the unleashed sword and half of Purgatory
turned into nothing.
dialogs_chapter_6_Вероломгеры не были го:
The traitors were not ready for this, and Death suggested
a sound ultimatum for him.
dialogs_chapter_6_Он покинет Чистилище…:
He will leave Purgatory\..\..\.. Heh, or what’s left of him...
And no one will ever bother him. Orders will become
requests and suggestions. He will be the freest
being in the world of the Dead.
dialogs_chapter_6_Тайджи основал уголок:
Taiji founded a corner of peace for people like him.
Order of the Diabolics. Reapers who broke the laws
Purgatory, but still useful, sent into exile.
dialogs_chapter_6_И пройдя ритуал демони:
And after going through the ritual of demonization, they 
become diabolical. The door to the order is open for them.
dialogs_chapter_6_Отец никогда не говори: Father never talked about it\..\..\.. Why?
dialogs_chapter_6_Чтобы ты не начал поис:
So that you don't start searching and dig yourself into the same 
hole, that Taiji.
dialogs_chapter_6_Теперь ясно почему Гил:
Now it’s clear why Gilgant didn’t find anything. About this you can’t 
write a joint with pride in your chronicles. Either out of shame
either out of fear no one wrote anything down, but the story was 
decided shut up and blame it on Cataclysm or some other crap.
dialogs_chapter_6_Мой брат превратил теб: My brother turned you into a monster?
dialogs_chapter_6_Вряд ли, характер Рика: It's unlikely, Rick's character has always been like this.
dialogs_chapter_6_Он мне помог, во много: He helped me in many ways. But you don't need to know more.
dialogs_chapter_6_Лаурита. Скажи, как ты:
Laurita. Tell me how you want to end this whole story with
devastators, punishers, battle reapers?
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты всегда хотела объед:
You always wanted to unite our corps. Me and everyone,
Those who killed the reapers should be expelled or kept in 
separate groups.
dialogs_chapter_6_Но Смерть раз за разом: But Death took my side over and over again.
dialogs_chapter_6_Покинь Чистилище с мир:
Leave Purgatory in peace and never be caught again
in my eyes.
dialogs_chapter_6_Обнажаешь против меня: You expose my gift to you against me.
dialogs_chapter_6_Я всегда знал, что ты: I always knew that you were the main threat to Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_6_Твой отец с этой стерв:
Your father and that bitch, Bella Ruri, decided to play
family. You see, their human feelings began to play.
dialogs_chapter_6_Сидрин, Белла, ты… Вы:
Sidrin, Bella, you\..\..\.. You are the only ones in Purgatory 
who Calls itself family.
dialogs_chapter_6_Сидрин обязался следит:
Sidrin has pledged to keep an eye on you, putting his
life.
dialogs_chapter_6_А ты раз за разом нару:
And you violated our laws over and over again. It's a pity that 
you didn't critical.
dialogs_chapter_6_Все с кем ты общался,: Everyone you interacted with changed without noticing it.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рикард крепок схватил: Rickard grabbed Ryom tightly by the throat.
dialogs_chapter_6_Смерть хотела создать:
Death wanted to create a society of reapers who were in no way 
similar on people. There wasn't supposed to be anything human 
about us.
dialogs_chapter_6_Всего лишь пара ограни: Just a couple of limited personality traits.
dialogs_chapter_6_А ты… Своим существова:
And you\..\..\.. With your existence you are destroying everything 
that we are so took a long time to create.
dialogs_chapter_6_Знаешь почему я ненави:
Do you know why I hate people?! Look at their world.
They kill each other for food, money, imaginary ideas\..\..\..
Just give me a reason.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ты не лучше. Неконтрол:
You're no better. An uncontrollable, impulsive piece of meat.
All restrictions have been removed from you. You go where 
they don’t ask, you do what you want and somehow 
miraculously get away with it.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ради устранения таких:
It is for the sake of eliminating people like you that the punitive
frame. Any unnecessary manifestation of will must be 
suppressed. If this causes harm to Purgatory.
dialogs_chapter_6_Я ждал дня, когда смог:
I've been waiting for the day when I could crack your puny skull.
If you are faithful to Lady Death, Purgatory and our laws.
Stand still.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рикард крепко сжал пра:
Rickard clenched his right fist tightly and prepared to strike.
Finally, loosening the choke a little.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рик осмотрел левую рук:
Rick examined his left hand. She is torn open from hand to 
shoulder.
dialogs_chapter_6_Вот же сволочь. Бить д: What a bastard. Hit the lady in the rat, from the brace\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_6_В кабинете манеры забы: I forgot my manners in the office.
dialogs_chapter_6_Прости, Лаурита. Я хот:
Sorry, Laurita. I wanted to get rid of Riom and leave
voluntarily into exile.
dialogs_chapter_6_Вы настоящая влюбленна: You are a real couple in love, die together.
dialogs_chapter_6_Если бы не Риом, ты то: If it weren't for Ryom, you might have released your sword too.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рикард обнажил когти и: Rickard unsheathed his claws and tore his face open.
dialogs_chapter_6_За тем достал ампулу с:
Then he took out an ampoule of human blood and drank 
exactly a drop.
dialogs_chapter_6_Форма высвобождения. Ш: Release form. Sheren-Tizer Dialang. Cleaving reality.
dialogs_chapter_6_Риом готовься. Вас с Л: Riom get ready. Only a miracle can save you and Laurita now.
dialogs_chapter_6_До моей формы высвобож: Before my form of release you still have to go and go.
dialogs_chapter_6_Давно я не прибегал к: I haven't used this technique for a long time.
dialogs_chapter_6_Риом резким ударом пер:
Ryom cuts Ricard's throat with a sharp blow. So much so 
that the head was almost separated from the body.
dialogs_chapter_6_Нет-нет-нет, не сегодн: No, no, no, not today, we still need you.
dialogs_chapter_6_Вернись, а иначе и теб: Come back, otherwise I’ll kill you too.
dialogs_chapter_6_Не горячись, чистильщи:
Don’t get excited, cleaner, you’ll have time to settle your scores 
with Rickard.
dialogs_chapter_6_Вам бы к Влуру возвращ:
You should go back to Vloor, but you already miss
good news.
dialogs_chapter_6_Не нужно, оно того не:
No need, it's not worth it. As long as you're half a kilometer away 
from him If you get close, he will already have time to hide.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ага, уже. Его духовный: Yeah, already. His spiritual trace disappeared.
dialogs_chapter_6_*тяжело вздыхает* Ладн: *sighs heavily* Okay. Let's return to Vloor.
dialogs_chapter_6_Рикард пал, но его заб: Rickard fell, but another devil took him with him.
dialogs_chapter_6_А ещё он потерял всё,:
He also lost everything, he is no longer in the ranks of the 
reapers to appear.
dialogs_chapter_6_Хмм… Вы сдержали своё: Hmm\..\..\.. You kept your word, I'll keep mine.
dialogs_chapter_6_От ныне опустошители н:
From now on, the Devastators will no longer pose a threat to you.
Except wild ones. Alas, I cannot control them, so
I will not condemn you for murder.
dialogs_chapter_6_Я отзову всех разумных:
I will call off all intelligent devastators. This will make it easier 
for you moving around the canyon.
dialogs_chapter_6_Как только армия Восст:
As soon as the Rebel army is defeated, we will gather
council at headquarters and we will discuss the details of the 
contract with you.
dialogs_chapter_6_Хорошо, разберитесь со:
Okay, deal with your enemy, and then I'll contact you myself
with you.
dialogs_chapter_6_Как только будете гото:
As soon as you're ready, I'll take you to the nearest
Reaper teleport on the southern canyon.
dialogs_chapter_6_Хорошо… А! Так вот как: Good! So this is how you destroyed outposts from the inside.
dialogs_chapter_6_Да… Вашу систему телеп:
Yes\..\..\.. Your teleportation system still needs to be finalized 
and refine.
dialogs_chapter_6_Ладно. Риом, если ты г: Okay. Riom, if you're ready, come to Vloor, I'll teleport next.
dialogs_chapter_6_Спасибо, что были с на:
Thank you for being with us and going through half of Riom
Ruri's story! At the moment, the 7th episode is in development.
As soon as he comes out, return to the "Scout Outpost" 
teleporter and teleport to him.
